posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dan Collins
Hey everyone I just wanted to let you know that 2 drum backs just went up on Ebay. They are beat up and one appears to be trimmed, Both have authentic grades. One is a chance and the price isn't too bad. Just thought I would let all of you know about this. I also seen a Lenox back up there also.



Thanks,
Dan Collins
